symptoms.name: Myocarditis symptoms (if present)
symptoms.severity: Variable, depending on severity of myocarditis
symptoms.pattern: Can range from asymptomatic to severe heart failure

symptoms.name: Endocarditis symptoms (if present)
symptoms.severity: Variable, depending on severity of endocarditis
symptoms.pattern: Can include fever, fatigue, heart murmur

vital_signs.blood_pressure: Variable, may be hypotensive in severe cases

physical_findings: Signs of heart failure (if myocarditis severe)
risk_factors: Travel to areas with poor sanitation
Consumption of contaminated food or water

imaging_findings.echocardiogram: May show valvular abnormalities (endocarditis), decreased ejection fraction (myocarditis)
imaging_findings.chest_x_ray: May show cardiomegaly (enlarged heart) if myocarditis is severe

required: Clinical presentation consistent with typhoid fever
Positive blood culture for Salmonella Typhi
